page.title: 11Employment in the Addingtons
page.content: Little Addington. There are six farm workers,one land owner,eight school teachers,two social workers,one librarian,one bank manager, seven business owners,one pub owner,one one pub manager,one accountant,one market trader,one electrician,two doctors,two lorry drivers,one taxi driver,five business executives,thirty two house wives,one home worker, one agent,two secretaries,one nurse,twelve retired people,two publicans. Great Addington. There are two doctors,one grocer,two land owners,one whole saler,two market traders,three builders,one hairdresser, one publican,one dentist,one rector,two headteachers,one salesman,one postman, one security guard,one shoe maker,one sewing machine mechanic,two lorry drivers,one dinner lady and one post office keeper.
